name: Dissimilate II
description:
your estranged uncle left you a single item when he passed; a faded cardboard box, the image nearly wiped away by time sans a few characters on a dismal neon grid:

DIS_IMIL_TE II

 you crack open the dusty package and slot the blank cartridge.

the game has no instructions itself.

dissimilate? what does that mean? and how could it have been made in 2021? this console stopped being produced in the late 80s.

the back of the box, also faded, boasts of a few features that may have been impressive back then:

  • 8 LEVELS OF ENDLESS
  • SOUNDTRACK OF MUSIC
  • SEVERAL COLORS IN GRAPHICS
  • PUZZLE FOR BRAIN, RHYTHM FOR HAND
  • THEORETICAL HIGH SCORE: 40500

you dust your old controller off and plug it in
